snippet.title: The Stand Cast Q&A + Inside Look with Whoopi Goldberg
snippet.description:
Inspired by Stephen King’s iconic post-apocalyptic novel, join the cast and executive producers for an inside look at The Stand.

Join series stars Whoopi Goldberg, James Marsden, Greg Kinnear, Amber Heard, Jovan Adepo, Odessa Young and Owen Teague alongside showrunner Benjamin Cavell and executive producer Taylor Elmore, as they discuss bringing this epic story to life and what fans can expect when the series premieres Thursday, December 17, exclusively on CBS All Access. Moderated by Anthony Breznican of Vanity Fair. 

The much-anticipated limited event series begs the question, “where will you stand?” in the ultimate fight between good and evil. 

Love this panel? We have more in store for you and you don’t have to go anywhere! Watch The Watch - A First Look At BBC America’s Newest Series next: https://youtu.be/srAo3qwEeBg 

►► Enjoying New York Comic Con? Subscribe for more! ➡️  https://bit.ly/2HHvV83 
►► Don't miss our interactive show floor ➡️  https://www.findthemetaverse.com/
►► Get yourself an exclusive souvenir of our first all digital NYCC ➡️  https://bit.ly/3nqoGl7
